short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you spending too much time on a website? Nope it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you spending too much time on a website? Use Nope to block it! You will just have to right click on the website and click on "Add Nope for this website".

Nope is under MIT license, you can fork it on Github (https://github.com/ArmandGrillet/Nope).
